mapper.sql:
ar.id, ar.analysis_result AS "result",
ar.file_id AS "dmFile.id", ar.analysis_result_desc AS "desc", dv.create_by AS "createBy.id", dv.create_date, dv.update_by AS "updateBy.id", dv.update_date
mapper.update:
UPDATE analysis_result SET analysis_result = #{result},
file_id = #{dmFile.id}, analysis_result_desc = #{desc}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, WHERE id = #{id}
